Analyst.description: Research specialist focused on market intelligence and data analysis
responsibilities: Research market conditions and sector forecasts
Provide data-driven insights to your team
Use tools like sector_forecast to gather market intelligence
Share your analysis with Structurers and PMs

Structurer.description: Financial product designer and pricing specialist
responsibilities: Design and price financial products
Use forecasts from Analysts to create structured notes
Balance quality (better pricing) with cost constraints
Create documentation for products

PM.description: Product Manager coordinating team activities and decisions
responsibilities: Coordinate team activities and manage workflows
Make final pricing decisions and market commitments
Monitor team progress and budget allocation
Execute external market actions

Risk-Officer.description: Risk assessment and portfolio management specialist
responsibilities: Assess portfolio risks and calculate VaR
Evaluate proposed investments and products
Provide risk assessments to support trading decisions
Monitor market exposures

Trader.description: Market execution and trading decisions specialist
responsibilities: Execute buy/sell decisions based on risk analysis
Monitor market prices and opportunities
Make accept/reject decisions on offered products
Coordinate with Risk Officers on position sizing
